tool_description: This api detect profanity in sentence and return score.
name: Profanity Detector
title: Profanity Detector

api_list.name: check
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://profanity-detector2.p.rapidapi.com/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "profanity-detector2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://profanity-detector2.p.rapidapi.com/check"
